prompts: Create a cute, purple Pokemon with large ears and a small stature.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a small mammal with bright purple skin and green accents.
Generate an image of a quadruped creature with a playful personality and vibrant colors.
Make a Pokemon that has distinctive large ears and a round body, perfect for forest habitats.
Imagine a small, agile Pokemon that combines traits of a rabbit and a lizard.
Design a Pokemon that looks friendly and approachable, with a unique color palette.
Show me a purple and green Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a playful demeanor.
